acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should assign precise values and lengths when a String is annotated with @PodamStringValue
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldAssignPreciseValuesWithTheStringValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.StringValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the string value DjK1jMWjH5F1w9PF1VkI should have the length of 20
Then the Object should not be null
Then string [preciseStringValue] should be exactly like string [preciseStringValue]
